data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during ARIEL cruise from Cowes Road to New York started at 1777-11-17

Ship: Ariel (6th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Cowes Road - New York, 1st Observer: Charles Phipps (Captain), 2nd Observer: George Brisac (2nd Officer/Lieutenant), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 20G 429BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
